metadata.name: MacOS Network Service Scanning
metadata.comment: Detects enumeration of local or remote network services.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND ((endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/nc')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/netcat'))) AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('l')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/nmap')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/telnet'))))

output.summary: Detects enumeration of local or remote network services.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1046/T1046.md
